Package board

Class Board

java.lang.Object
board.Board
public class Board extends Object
Represents a board.

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board()
      Creates a Board object that corresponds to the original initial state of the puzzle.

    • Board

      public Board(Piece... pieces)
      Creates a Board object initializing the positions of the pieces with the positions specified. The constructor expects an array of eight Piece objects or eight Piece objects.
      Parameters:
      pieces - the initial positions of the pieces

  • Method Details

    • isValidMove

      public boolean isValidMove(int pieceNumber, Direction direction)
      Returns whether the where the piece wants to move is valid or not.
      Parameters:
      pieceNumber - the number of the piece
      direction - the direction where the piece wants to move
      Returns:
      whether the can move to the given direction

      Returns:

    • winPlayer

      public void winPlayer(Player player1, Player player2)
      Iterates through the pieces array if it finds a win state sets won of the winning player true.
      Parameters:
      player1 - first player object
      player2 - second player object

    • getPieceNumber

      public int getPieceNumber(Position position)
      Returns the number of the piece to a given position. If it doesn't find it returns -1.
      Parameters:
      position - a Position object
      Returns:
      the number of the piece

    • move

      public void move(int pieceNumber, Direction direction)
      Moves the given piece to a given direction. If a player moved one of his pieces the other one moves next.
      Parameters:
      pieceNumber - the number of the piece
      direction - the direction to move
